#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define getcx getchar_unlocked
int csort[1000001];
void inp(int &x)
{
	int c = getchar_unlocked();
	x = 0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = getchar_unlocked());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c = getchar_unlocked())
	{x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

int main() {
	int t;
	inp(t);

	while (t--) {
		long long m,  n;
		long long p, q, num, den;
		
		scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &m);

		p = 1;
		q = 1;

		for (long long j = 2; j <= n; j++) {
			num = p + q;
			den = num + q;
			p = num % m;
			q = den % m;
		}

		printf("%lld/%lld\n", p, q);
	}
}
